hero.title: <Fernanda Gabrielli/>
hero.subtitle: // A developer
phrases: who believes in the importance of constant learning, both in technology and languages.
who believes technology is not just about code, but about the possibility of changing the world.
who gets excited about the infinite possibilities that technology offers to innovate.
who sees every project as a chance to learn something new and contribute to something bigger.
who values the human perspective in everything she does.
who believes in the power of collaboration and the strength of social impact.
who has always been a dreamer and knew that giving up was never an option.
who is passionate about technology and the possibility of positively impacting people's daily lives.

aboutMe.title: Who am I?
aboutMe.description: Thinking about myself, I must say that I have always been driven by curiosity and the constant desire to learn. Throughout my journey, I have always valued personal and professional growth. One of the most remarkable experiences was my volunteer work with young people, where I had the opportunity to encourage them to transform their lives and seek new perspectives.
aboutMe.altProfile: I am a white woman with blonde hair, dark eyes, and dark eyebrows. I am wearing a black blouse and a silver chain over the blouse.

project1.name: GabsX
project1.description: A Twitter-inspired project, used to practice Django.

project2.name: Efood
project2.description: A functional restaurant delivery project, used for studying React and testing frameworks.
